body:
Main change is that `libelf` and `libffi` libraries are not a hard dependency for CPU-only builds. Also, `flang` was previously removed and then appeared again -- a regression that occured in the previous PR? FYI: Legacy flang lives in its own Spack package and f18 has not been upstreamed into llvm yet, but we are getting really close.

@trws
title: Minor LLVM libomptarget fixes
